title: TigeJoy 2PCS 16inch Coco Coir Liners for Hanging Baskets, 100% Natural Coco Fiber Replacement Liner, 16'' Round Thick Coconut Liners for Garden Plants Flower Vegetable Pot Flowerpot Planter Insert
features: ▶[STURDY COCO LINERS] You will get 2 pieces 16 inches thick round coco liners, which are the great replacement liner for any 16'' basket planters. You can plant any plants and flowers on these durable coconut linings.

▶[100% NATURE ＆ ECO-FRIENDLY] TigeJoy hanging basket liners are made from the pure natural premium fiber of ripe coconuts, perfect applicate in indoors and out hanging baskets, hanging planter, flower pot, wallflower baskets, and other types of planters/containers.

▶[LET PLANTING EASIER] Coco fiber liner is good at moisture regulation and offers enough air for roots to breath, which results in greater plant vigor. So that you only need to put soil and plants on the liner to keep the plants moist, then they will grow faster.

▶[DECORATE YOUR SPACE] The natural look of coco coir liner makes a striking statement, great for decorating the living room, garden, balcony, and bedroom, which keep you in a good mood every day. Such a distinctive coco planter in your garden must be the envy of the neighborhood.
❤️[100% Satisfaction Guaranteed] Any questions regarding this coconut planter liners item, please feel free to contact us. We offer 12 months warranty & the most timely after-sales service.
description: No alternatives are more favored by plants than Natural Coconut Fiber Liner
Unlike their alternatives, coco liners can regulate your soil's moisture levels so that plants stay healthy.

Coco liners can hold up to 8x their weight in water. Excessive water will drain the flower pot through the gaps. And when the soil dries out., the moisture in the fiber will be slowly released to the plant.
This makes the right balance of moisture a lot easier!
The porous structure of the fiber ensures that the roots can carry out sufficient respiration, especially aerobic respiration, which can protect the young roots and help them absorb more energy.
Coco liners have a neutral pH, natural traces of potassium and phosphorous, which can protect your plants, and enhance plant health.

TigeJoy coco liner can last through multiple growing seasons. Like any other material, no coco liner will last forever. However, We chose tougher coco fiber and used integrated indentation to make a pre-formed liner, resisting both time and decomposition.
Because they are 100% natural, coco liners are also biodegradable! Plant them (along with your plants) directly into the soil or mix the liner into the dirt for natural fertilizer.
